data.chText: 粗沙 / 盐；粗糙的毛发
粗鲁无礼的，粗俗的（尤指涉及性的）
data.enText: rude and offensive, especially about sex
coarsely chopped onions (= cut into large pieces)

means: 粗鲁无礼的，粗俗的(尤指涉及性的)

ex.chText: 为什么这张粗糙的木桌如此昂贵？
ex.enText: Why was this rough wooden table so expensive?

ex.chText: 皮肤粗糙是困扰很多人的常见问题。
ex.enText: Rough skin is a very common problem affecting many people.

synonyms.bx: 指制作不够精细的，或表面不平滑的。

ex.chText: 她粗糙的双手是常年艰辛劳作的结果。
ex.enText: Her coarse hands are the result of years of hard work.

ex.chText: 他新买的粗羊毛夹克衫不保暖。
ex.enText: His new jacket of coarse wool failed to keep him warm.

ex.chText: 如果你想做出美味的蛋糕，那么不要用粗盐。
ex.enText: Coarse salt shouldn't be used if you want to make tasty cakes.

synonyms.bx: 指皮肤或布料不光滑的，也指构成部分粗大的。

ex.chText: 尽管工艺粗糙，这款花瓶销量很好。
ex.enText: In spite of its crude workmanship, this type of vase sells well.

ex.chText: 他只能描画出窃贼脸部的大致轮廓。
ex.enText: He can only provide a crude drawing of the thief's face.

synonyms.bx: 指制作水平不高、细节欠雕琢打磨的。

ex.chText: 真的有人能够在那件简陋的小木屋里生活一年吗？
ex.enText: Is there anyone who can really live in that rude wooden hut for one year?

synonyms.bx: 指房屋简陋的，或设施不完备的。

tr: lacking refinement or cultivation or taste
example: he had coarse manners but a first-rate mind
behavior that branded him as common
an untutored and uncouth human being
an uncouth soldier--a real tough guy
appealing to the vulgar taste for violence
the vulgar display of the newly rich

tr: of textures that are rough to the touch or substances consisting of relatively large particles
of low or inferior quality or value
example: of what coarse metal ye are molded"- Shakespear
produced...the common cloths used by the poorer population

value.def: Coarse things have a rough texture because they consist of thick threads or large pieces.

example.ex: ...a jacket made of very coarse cloth.

value.def: If you describe someone as coarse, you mean that he or she talks and behaves in a rude and offensive way.

example.ex: The soldiers did not bother to moderate their coarse humour in her presence.
example.tran: 她在的时候，士兵们还是照样说粗俗的笑话，都懒得收敛。

example.ex: The women laughed coarsely at some vulgar joke.
example.tran: 听到个有点下流的笑话，女人们放肆地笑了起来。

example.ex: The coarseness of her cursing amazed the workmen.
example.tran: 她骂人的那些粗话让工人们大吃一惊。
